name: Agricola: Special Edition
description:
The cycle of farming is eternal—plowing, sowing, harvesting, and ensuring that every mouth is fed. Life on the farm is simple yet demanding, requiring both strategy and resilience to thrive.

Agricola: Special Edition revitalizes Uwe Rosenberg’s iconic board game, bringing it to life with new artwork and refined usability. This special edition includes all previously released expansions and introduces Irrigations, a brand-new expansion that challenges players to manage water resources to sustain and grow their farms.

—description from the publisher
